::Zdorab/Snitch::

Takes the weapon and inspects it. �Hm� very interesting� sure, I think I can
whip you up something like this� seems relatively simple in design� was it
mass produced where you got it? Oh, never mind, sure. I could have you one
shortly. You want to wait for a little bit while I�m working? Snitch makes
great conversation.� He is already walking towards a large tan tent with
typical workbench machinery.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----

Snitch is playing with a stick of uranium and a shrapnel grenade like they
were dolls, making them talk to each other, and fight and so forth, doesn�t
really seem to notice Nu�s presence at all.
